::: {.cell}

:::


::: {.cell}

:::

This page provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**M3.7 Chemosynthetic-based-ecosystems (CBE)**](/efg-info/M3_7.qmd). For older or alternative maps, see [here](/map-info/M3_7_history.qmd).

## Methods

Here is the methods summary for **Map code and version**: M3.7.web.orig v1.0.

> Major occurrences of Chemosynthetic-based ecosystems was based on the distribution of hydrothermal vents on spreading plate boundaries mapped in ‘Plate lines and polygons’ data by USGS/ESRI. Occurrences were converted to 30 arc second spatial resolution. The distribution of cold seeps is poorly known and was not mapped.

::: {.cell}

:::



::: {.cell}

:::



### Datasets

**ESRI-plate-tectonics** (USGS/ESRI N/D):

Source of _topography and geomorphology_.
 Resolution: variable (polygons), static.
 Accuracy evaluation: not found.

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}

:::

### Processing

Processing steps used in this map are: *NA*.

### Map evaluation


This map is considered to be a ***Coarse quality map*** based on the following characteristics:

Concept alignment is *Indirect,general*.

Ground observations are _no_.

 The accuracy evaluation *Undocumented,undocumented*.

## How to use the data

### Available files

:::{.aside}

Following maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group. `Web navigation` maps are optimised for use in webapps, but they have similar methods and differ only in details of format and processing. 

- Web navigation (**code: M3.7.web.orig**, version v1.0) 
 - Indicative Map (**code: M3.7.IM.orig**, version v1.0) 


:::

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

**M3.7.web.orig** (v1.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/M3.7.web.orig_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090988){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/M3.7.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](layers/M3.7.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](M3.7.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"} :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/){target="gisdata"}

**M3.7.IM.orig** (v1.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/M3.7.IM.orig_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

License information for some datasets used to create this map is incomplete or undocumented. Check details below.


::: {.cell}
